description:
Have you ever wondered how designers create the interesting textures you often see? In this course, you will learn how to create textured images using Photoshop like the professionals.

Join professional game designer and artist Chad Walker in this course on using Photoshop like a professional designer. You will learn professional image texturing techniques starting from the basics and moving on to more complex texturing skills.

A background in design is recommended for this course, but even those with no design experience can follow along and learn the texturing skills Chad teaches.

All image files, Photoshop files and examples are included in this course.

A basic knowledge of Photoshop is recommended for this course.
title: Creating Seamless Textures in Photoshop
